question:
[Anne] thought it would be nice to have a family dinner, so she asked her sister [Kelley] and her mother [Jenny] to go get Sushi together. [Kelley] thought it would be best to not invite her sister [Kimberley] to the dinner. [James] took his wife [Kimberley] out for dinner.
Question: How is [Jenny] related to [James]?
